97e3b0d7-3320-4eb5-bc42-5031db87692e.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial both report Objective Response Rate (ORR) of their patients.
97e3b0d7-3320-4eb5-bc42-5031db87692e.Label: Contradiction

83251670-803e-4fec-a5cf-50f052932752.Statement: All Participants with disease progression (After 16 Weeks of Treatment) in the primary trial were in the Afatinib 50 mg With Letrozole group.
83251670-803e-4fec-a5cf-50f052932752.Label: Contradiction

efd950a8-ae79-4d4a-9ce7-3f1d0a37e6de.Statement: 1 patient in the primary trial had an abrupt loss of heart function.
efd950a8-ae79-4d4a-9ce7-3f1d0a37e6de.Label: Entailment

e00b0ccc-e53b-44ba-9555-b6f8d6d5e55a.Statement: The most common adverse event in the primary trial was Febrile neutropenia (42.86%), whereas in the secondary trial it was a decrease in Ejection fraction (4.95%).
e00b0ccc-e53b-44ba-9555-b6f8d6d5e55a.Label: Entailment

97812fde-57f3-4299-be34-dd436757adde.Statement: Patients with cancer cells in lymph nodes above the collarbone cannot enter the primary trial.
97812fde-57f3-4299-be34-dd436757adde.Label: Entailment

f37774f4-db96-4aa6-b3a1-626953faeecf.Statement: Adequate blood, kidney, and hepatic function are required to participate in the secondary trial, however this condition is not specified in the primary trial.
f37774f4-db96-4aa6-b3a1-626953faeecf.Label: Entailment

4fef4cdf-53bf-4239-9d31-4710fd3edc6f.Statement: The Ridaforolimus + Dalotuzumab + Exemestane group of the primary trial had a median PFS of over 38.43 months.
4fef4cdf-53bf-4239-9d31-4710fd3edc6f.Label: Contradiction

331affb2-f8e9-4a55-ac4c-62d2ecc4f80b.Statement: The only difference between the interventions used in the primary trial is the patients position.
331affb2-f8e9-4a55-ac4c-62d2ecc4f80b.Label: Entailment

a577e819-c928-4217-8743-f4809e852919.Statement: Patients must have a white blood cell count above 1,500/mm¬¨‚â• to participate in the primary trial.
a577e819-c928-4217-8743-f4809e852919.Label: Entailment

bd073d05-3ba2-4898-9d86-a51951a7ad1f.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial both use tumor Objective response rate to measure the effects of their different interventions.
bd073d05-3ba2-4898-9d86-a51951a7ad1f.Label: Contradiction
